com.iitb.android_fb5
Class BluetoothComm

java.lang.Object
  com.iitb.android_fb5.BluetoothComm

public class BluetoothComm
extends java.lang.Object

Class to implement all routines related to bluetooth communication. Task: Initialise bluetooth and establish connection. Send a byte array over the BT channel. Disconnect from the BT device and free the BT channel.
